review: I love it! I bought the Fire TV Stick because I was tired of paying the high cost for premium moves through my cable provider and I'm an Amazon Prime member and have Netflix and can watch all the free movies I want with this.  Setup was super easy.  I've experienced no skipping or hanging.  I can take it with me when traveling.  I'm very happy with it.
